title: In Conversation: Craig Whitlock on 20 years of U.S. lies about Afghanistan
itunes:title: In Conversation: Craig Whitlock on 20 years of U.S. lies about Afghanistan
description: Craig Whitlock is the Washington Post reporter behind The Afghanistan Papers. Whitlock obtained a trove of government documents that revealed the false narrative the U.S. government had been pushing about the war for decades.
content:encoded: Craig Whitlock is the Washington Post reporter behind The Afghanistan Papers. Whitlock obtained a trove of government documents that revealed the false narrative the U.S. government had been pushing about the war for decades.
